question: A healthcare provider uses Azure to manage patient data, needing to ensure compliance with privacy regulations across all resources and unify governance for data stored in Azure SQL and external SaaS apps. Which Azure tools address these governance needs? (Select all that apply.)

explanations.It allows data to be accessible even if: Correct. ZRS replicates data across availability zones to ensure high availability.
explanations.It guarantees data replication to a seco: Incorrect. That is provided by geo-redundant storage (GRS), not ZRS.
